questions.title: So this other guy? He's a terminator too, right, like you?
options: Yes, he is a terminator with living tissue over a metal endoskeleton
Not like me. A T-1000. Advanced prototype. Liquid metal

questions.title: Where we going?
options: We are going to visit your mom
We have to leave the city, immediately
I must introduce you to my friend, the T-1000
